name: A Dumb Car Game
description:
Move around, collect, and stuff try not to die. Pretty easy. There's no AI, I made this in less than 24 hours due to personal things. I also couldn't come up with an idea. 

Made using Roblox Studio, I might be making a video and working on this project later. Really just a prototype. 

Game Link: https://www.roblox.com/games/10594683420/A-Dumb-Car-Game

The Roblox Studio file can be downloaded if you wanted to check it out or play it that way.
